materials.raw_text:
Ag (Silver): 15 g 
 Co (Cobalt): 10 g 
 Nd (Neodymium): 8 g 
 Si (Silicon): 30 g

sourcing.instructions:
Ag (Silver): Purchase from a precious metals supplier or jewelry store. 
 Co (Cobalt): Obtain from chemical supply companies or online marketplaces. 
 Nd (Neodymium): Source from rare earth suppliers or online retailers. 
 Si (Silicon): Available at electronics or chemical suppliers.

preparation.raw_text:

steps: 1. Once cooled, carefully remove the solid sample from the crucible.
